name: bobble lines baby blanket
notes:
purchasable pdf pattern: https://www.etsy.com/listing/706575291/crochet-bobble-lines-baby-blanket

youtube tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=raq5bo358sq

materials
* 4 skeins of bernat softee baby yarn in white
* 1 skein of bernat softee baby yarn in soft red
* 1 skein of bernat softee baby yarn in soft peach
* 1 skein of bernat softee baby yarn in aqua
* 1 skein of bernat softee baby yarn in navy
* size h hook
* tapestry needle
* scissors
